title: LIRD
description: Existing reinforcement learning recommender methods also could recommend a list of items. E.g. DQN can calculate Q-values of all recalled items separately, and recommend a list of items with highest Q-values. But these recommendations are similar in Euclidean space and we want to find similarity in associative space.
